I upload on unmoderated hell-hole as TPB just for you, guys. You know that.  Here, every prick can say what he wants, without any merit, without any proof, who he is, does he know anything about, whatever shit he comes up with. Here we have (again) two "voices" of people who even haven't downloaded my encodes, probably never did, have no idea about many things and for sure have not anything to say but to spill venom, which drove me out of TPB.
I am just stupid enough to eat that crap because of my stupid need to make life easier for people on crappy connections.
Well, it's on me, my friends. If you can, come to my home-site, here is more and more - toxic and pointless.
